name: Gem of True Sight
description:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

abilities.name: Reveal
abilities.description: Reveals and exposes enemy units and wards within the target area for a while.
notes: Exposes enemies within the area, revealing them through the Fog of War, and also provides True Sight over them
The effects are provided by an aura and lingers for 0.5 seconds
Cannot detect units under the effect of Shadow Dance, but can detect units affected by other sources of True Sight immunity
The visual effect created at the target area is visible to the casting team only. The sound is audible to both teams

abilities.name: True Sight
abilities.description: Reveals nearby invisible enemy units and wards, rendering them visible to the owner and their team.
notes: Grants True Sight within its radius by an aura which affects enemies, it is not obstructed by anything
As True Sight implies, it doesn't affect enemies with True Sight Immunity

abilities.name: Everlasting
abilities.description: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
notes: While on the ground, the gem provides flying vision around itself to the last team that dropped it

additionalInfo: Gem of True Sight drops when the wielder dies, unless they have Reincarnation
This item cannot be put into the backpack
This item can also be used by the enemies of the owner
Gem of True Sight does not count towards the owner's net worth if it is on the ground
Unlike Divine Rapier, the item does not change owner when picked up by someone else, meaning that it can only affect the buyer's net worth
Both the Tempest Double and Wukong's Command Soldiers do not copy this item
trivia: This item is based on the Gem of True Seeing from Warcraft 3

Windranger response while having the Compass of the Rising Gale equipped upon buying Gem of True Sight suggests that the Gem of True Sight is slippery, possibly explaining its nature of dropping upon death
In DOTA: Dragon's Blood. The Gem of True sight is used as a bargaining tool for Mirana, Invoker, and Terrorblade

recentChanges.description: No longer provides True Sight around the dropped location for the dropping team. ADDED new Reveal active ability.
Now provides 300 radius ground vision and True Sight around the location Gem of True Sight is dropped, for the last team that dropped it. Lasts until picked up.
True Sight no longer works on illusions.
